languages.text: "Ваши слова были услышаны, Вольный Торговец. Однако сейчас настоящий преступник — это вы. Вы похитили десятину Простора, на это указывают неоспоримые улики, включая свидетельство проктора Антара, и вы должны понести наказание по всей строгости Лекс Империалис".

"Your words have been heard, Rogue Trader. However, you are the real criminal now. You stole the Expanse's tithe, of which there is irrefutable evidence including the testimony of Proctor Anthar; therefore you are to be punished to the fullest extent of the Lex Imperialis."
languages.original_text: "Ваши слова были услышаны, Вольный Торговец. Однако сейчас настоящий преступник — это вы. Вы похитили десятину Простора, на это указывают неоспоримые улики, включая свидетельство проктора Антара, и вы должны понести наказание по всей строгости Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: "Your words have been heard, Rogue Trader. However, you are the real criminal now. You stole the Expanse's tithe, of which there is irrefutable evidence including the testimony of Proctor Anthar; therefore you are to be punished to the fullest extent of the Lex Imperialis."

"Your words have been heard, Rogue Trader. However, you are the real criminal now. You stole the Expanse's tithe, of which there is irrefutable evidence including the testimony of Proctor Anthar; therefore you are to be punished to the fullest extent of the Lex Imperialis."

languages.text: "Eure Worte wurden gehört, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Dennoch seid nun Ihr {mf|der wahre Verbrecher|die wahre Verbrecherin}. Ihr habt den Zehnt der Ausdehnung gestohlen, wofür eindeutige Beweise vorliegen, darunter die Aussage von Proktor Anthar. Ihr werdet darum nach dem vollen Ausmaß des Lex Imperia bestraft."
languages.original_text: "Your words have been heard, Rogue Trader. However, you are the real criminal now. You stole the Expanse's tithe, of which there is irrefutable evidence including the testimony of Proctor Anthar; therefore you are to be punished to the fullest extent of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Worte wurden gehört, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Dennoch seid nun Ihr {mf|der wahre Verbrecher|die wahre Verbrecherin}. Ihr habt den Zehnt der Ausdehnung gestohlen, wofür eindeutige Beweise vorliegen, darunter die Aussage von Proktor Anthar. Ihr werdet darum nach dem vollen Ausmaß des Lex Imperia bestraft."

languages.text: « Vos paroles ont été entendues, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Toutefois, vous êtes {mf|le véritable criminel|la véritable criminelle} à présent. Vous avez volé la dîme des Étendues, comme en témoignent les preuves irréfutables notamment avancées par le proctor Anthar. Vous serez {mf|puni|punie} selon les principes de la Lex Imperialis. »
languages.original_text: "Your words have been heard, Rogue Trader. However, you are the real criminal now. You stole the Expanse's tithe, of which there is irrefutable evidence including the testimony of Proctor Anthar; therefore you are to be punished to the fullest extent of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles ont été entendues, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Toutefois, vous êtes {mf|le véritable criminel|la véritable criminelle} à présent. Vous avez volé la dîme des Étendues, comme en témoignent les preuves irréfutables notamment avancées par le proctor Anthar. Vous serez {mf|puni|punie} selon les principes de la Lex Imperialis. »

languages.text: “你的话我听得很清楚，行商浪人，但现在，你才是真正的罪犯。你窃取了科罗努斯扩区的神圣什一税，安萨监察官也提供了证词，这是无可辩驳的罪证。因此，你将会受到帝国法典最大程度的严惩。”
languages.original_text: "Your words have been heard, Rogue Trader. However, you are the real criminal now. You stole the Expanse's tithe, of which there is irrefutable evidence including the testimony of Proctor Anthar; therefore you are to be punished to the fullest extent of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: “你的话我听得很清楚，行商浪人，但现在，你才是真正的罪犯。你窃取了科罗努斯扩区的神圣什一税，安萨监察官也提供了证词，这是无可辩驳的罪证。因此，你将会受到帝国法典最大程度的严惩。”

languages.text: «Sus palabras quedan registradas, Comerciante Independiente. No obstante, ahora usted es {mf|el|la} verdader{mf|o|a} criminal. Ha robado el diezmo de la Extensión y tenemos pruebas irrefutables de ello, incluyendo el testimonio del Procurador Anthar. Por lo tanto, será castigad{mf|o|a} con todo el peso de la Lex Imperialis».
languages.original_text: "Your words have been heard, Rogue Trader. However, you are the real criminal now. You stole the Expanse's tithe, of which there is irrefutable evidence including the testimony of Proctor Anthar; therefore you are to be punished to the fullest extent of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras quedan registradas, Comerciante Independiente. No obstante, ahora usted es {mf|el|la} verdader{mf|o|a} criminal. Ha robado el diezmo de la Extensión y tenemos pruebas irrefutables de ello, incluyendo el testimonio del Procurador Anthar. Por lo tanto, será castigad{mf|o|a} con todo el peso de la Lex Imperialis».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、あなたの言葉は聞きました。しかし、今やあなたは真の犯罪者です。アンサール代理人の証言を含む動かぬ証拠とともに、あなたはエクスパンスの租税を盗みました。よって、レックス・インペリアの最大限の刑罰を受けることになります」
languages.original_text: "Your words have been heard, Rogue Trader. However, you are the real criminal now. You stole the Expanse's tithe, of which there is irrefutable evidence including the testimony of Proctor Anthar; therefore you are to be punished to the fullest extent of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、あなたの言葉は聞きました。しかし、今やあなたは真の犯罪者です。アンサール代理人の証言を含む動かぬ証拠とともに、あなたはエクスパンスの租税を盗みました。よって、レックス・インペリアの最大限の刑罰を受けることになります」

languages.text: "Sözleriniz duyuldu Hür Tacir. Ancak artık gerçek suçlu sizsiniz. Enginlik'in aşarını çaldığınıza dair elimizde, Üsteğmen Anthar'ın ifadesi de dâhil olmak üzere su götürmez deliller var. Bu sebeple Lex İmperialis uyarınca en ağır şekilde cezalandırılacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "Your words have been heard, Rogue Trader. However, you are the real criminal now. You stole the Expanse's tithe, of which there is irrefutable evidence including the testimony of Proctor Anthar; therefore you are to be punished to the fullest extent of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Sözleriniz duyuldu, Hür Tacir. Ancak artık gerçek suçlu sizsiniz. Enginlik'in aşarını çaldığınıza dair elimizde, Üsteğmen Anthar'ın ifadesi de dahil olmak üzere su götürmez deliller var. Bu sebeple Lex İmperialis uyarınca en ağır şekilde cezalandırılacaksınız."
